nodes.text: Keven Tarr was a human male technician and slicer who worked for the Ministry of Technology on the planet Hetzal Prime. When the Hetzal system was threatened by hyperspace anomalies from the Great Hyperspace Disaster, Tarr was sent over by the ministry to assist Minister Zeffren Ecka. He was able to bring up a map of the anomalies in the star system by combining the feeds from the remaining undestroyed satellites, and later picked up a transmission from Jedi Master Avar Kriss reassuring the people of Hetzal that help was on the way.
After the Emergence in the Hetzal system had ceased, Keven worked onboard the Third Horizon monitoring the reconstruction of the Legacy Run.
